entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
